#summary Persistence support for Google Guice applications

= Introduction =

warp-persist is a simple extension to Guice for integrating persistence libraries. Out of the box, warp-persist integrates Hibernate, Java Persistence API (JPA) and Db4objects.

You can use warp-persist in _any_ Guice application. It works inside web and servlet applications as well as EJB and desktop applications. All with a few simple configuration steps.
